item.title: Beogram 4002 (5513): Full Functional Restoration and Installation of Beolover Commander Remote
item.description:
This document details the restoration of a Beogram 4002 (Type 5513) turntable. Initial assessment of the unit can be found on a separate blog post. The restoration began with the platter motor, as its bearings require a lengthy oil treatment. The motor was extracted, disassembled, and its bearings were submerged in oil under a vacuum to allow for optimal oil diffusion. Concurrently, the carriage assembly was cleaned. All “motion critical” parts, including the arm and its associated mechanisms, were removed, ultrasonically cleaned, and reassembled...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-5513-full-functional-restoration-and-installation-of-beolover-commander-remote/

item.title: Beogram 4002 (Type 5513): A New Arrival from California - First Assessment
item.description:
I recently received a Beogram 4002 turntable (model 5513) from a California customer. The turntable was shipped in a container provided by Beolover, ensuring a smooth transit process. This article details my initial assessment of the unit. Upon unboxing, the turntable appeared to be in fair cosmetic condition. However, there were noticeable fingerprints on the keypad and a few minor scratches on the aluminum panel. The plinth corners, on the other hand, were well-preserved...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-type-5513-a-new-arrival-from-california-first-assessment/
